title: murugan tirunAmattai nI
sahitya:
murugan tirunAmattai nI karudi varuvAi manamE dinamE


anupallavi

  kurai Edum illA nirai vAzhvaip-peravE varai Edum illA karuNaik-kaDalAm


caraNam    pirai shUDum perumAnin guruvAgi shirandOn shirai mILa surarkku urutuNai purindOn
kurai mAdait-tEDi maNam puriya vandOn aruNagiriyArkku aruLai vArit-tandOn
